column4: my laptop has this wierd behaviour of the screen dimming when on AC power but bright screen when it is running on battery. I would like to change this behaviour .. how can I do it?
what happens when you change the brightness and then unplug/replug
I can't increase the brightness with the function key on my laptop .. is there any other way to do it?
right now .. the only way for me to increase the brightness is to unplug
I have been trying the power management thing .. the GUI never comes up .. it seems like it is broken..
gnome-power-manager is the binary file on my sys, try running it from cli (or whatever it is named on yours) and see what it says
.. I did login as root using su and then ran the command..
.. Yes I have considered updating it to the newer ubuntu .. but just didn't want the trouble .. but I ma y do it.. :)
I really don't know, I don't use gnome (or ubuntu for that matter), and usually dell vostros work...I'm running out of ideas
your suggestion of booting it plugged in worked! thanks a lot :)
